description: man with light colored hair wearing a light suit jacket, striped shirt and dark tie, with his PR hand raised, standing, taking an oath to testify given by a balding man wearing a dark suit, with his PR hand raised, seen from back, standing in front of man
marks: Signature and Edition LRC below image, in pencil: [Joseph Hirsch]
provenance: [Thomas French Fine Art, Fairlawn, Ohio, until 2008; sold in October for IPT, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2008-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Taking the Oath
